reviews.text: Stayed here with my wife and two teenage kids the night before our trip to London. Were given free parking and shuttle to and from the airport also. The staff were very helpful and efficient. The night manager also helped out in the restaurant as there seemed to be a shortage of staff. The room was very nice and comfortable too!
reviews.title: Excellent comfortable hotel pre morning flight!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We ended up here after a flight was cancelled. We were pleasantly surprised by the quality of the accommodation. I think it must be quite a new hotel, very modern and in good condition. The room was large and comfortable. Of course it is not in town at all, it was a 10 min ride to the airport with the complementary shuttle (every 30 min).
reviews.title: Very nice and new hotel

reviews.text: What I like about Premier Inn is that you know exactly what to expect. Clean, modern rooms & good service. The location in this case is ideal for Dublin Airport, 5 min by car (they offer shuttle service, but check the times.) We stayed twice during our holiday. Unfortunately the second time coincided with christmas dinners being held at the hotel, so we did have some noise of people shouting in the corridor, car park, etc. at night. But I guess you'll get this at a lot of hotels at this time of the year. Also the fire alarm went off briefly, waking our 3 month old baby. Would stay again though.
reviews.title: As good as always

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel prior to flying down to Venice and were pleased with the staff and the hotel. It was clean, the beds were comfortable, and the shower was great. I'd stay here again!
reviews.title: Great Value!

reviews.text: Hotel is perfect if your goin to thr wrights venue its prob a 2 minute walk away,the hotel sell bands for the night club for 10 euro each savin u the queue into the night club and 5 euro!!
reviews.title: Perfect if your going to the Wrights Venue

reviews.text: Great hotel-perfect location for a great night at the Wright Venue
reviews.title: Perfect hotel for a great night at the wright venue

reviews.text: This was my first stay at the Premier Inn Dublin airport and i wasnt disappointed. I got the twin room for 64 euro's which i felt was very good for 2 adults. On arrival i found the staff to be more than helpful and was checked in very quickly and efficiently. The room was large compared to other hotels i have stayed in around this same area, and the beds were so comfortable - had the best night sleep!! the room had air-con, free pay tv channels, tea/coffee making facilities etc.
reviews.title: A very pleasant stay in a very good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My friend and i decided to try out the restaurant in the hotel, and i felt it offered good value, they had a 2 course meal for 13.50 euro's and i would rate the food as very good. The staff were very attentive and pleasant too. The continental breakfast option the next morning was good.
reviews.title: Stay here if flying out of Dublin!!

reviews.text: I stayed here to go on a shopping trip into dublin and i found that the hotel was very close to transport links. There was a bus (41&43 service) stop just round the corner which only cost 2.30 euro's single to get into the city centre, and it didnt take too long about 25-30mins.
reviews.title: Can't beat it for quick trip to the airport

reviews.text: One thing that i didnt quiet like was the price of wi-fi. I found the vouchers from reception very dear, and i discovered the cheapest way to get wi-fi was by paying by credit card online , it costed me 10 euro's for 24hr access, it was such a pity wi-fi wasnt free like in some other close by hotels, but to be honest this wouldnt put me off staying here at all. I plan to return here later on in the year.
reviews.title: Can't really fault it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for one night as we were getting an early morning flight..... reception staff were very friendly and helpful. We had dinner in the restaurant which was very good and the staff again were friendly and polite. Have stayed in other Premier Inn's in the UK and this is by far the best one I have stayed in. The service was better than some of the four star hotels I have stayed in. The bus to the airport is handy and is a euro per adult. Would stay here again when getting an early morning flight.
reviews.title: presently surprised, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked Premier inn hotel as we were flying to Birmingham for a football match early on the saturday morning.
reviews.title: brilliant hotel, fantastic location, great service

reviews.text: The hotel was spotlessly clean, hotel staff were very friendly and bar/bistro was lovely.
reviews.title: Perfect for it's existence

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would have no problem reccomending this hotel to anyone.
reviews.title: We give it 6 out of 5!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is a big night club situated near the hotel - not at any time did it interfere with our stay - there were bouncers on the door and not once did we hear any noise or disturbance.
reviews.title: Comfortable, location has some known issues

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room spacious,clean with nice comfy bed !
reviews.title: Good hotel - good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only thing that i did not like was no fridge in the room , also the light over the wash basin in the bathroom can not be switched off, therefore no option for softer light if one prefers
reviews.title: Will definately be returning

reviews.text: Such a pleasant stay especially when it was soo cheap, availed of the parking whilst away in the USA for a week unbeatable pricing.
reviews.title: Spotless comfortabe affordable accomodation highly recommended

reviews.text: Hotel staff were really nice and hotel was so comfortable.
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.text: My daughter and I booked a double double room i.e. two extremely comfortable double beds. Bedroom and ensuite were absolutely spotless. Shower actually has built in seat.
reviews.title: Good value at Premier Inn
